title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The factors that influence an individual’s phenotype do not include both of the following.

· Genetic information

· Environmental influences

The factors that influence an individual’s phenotype include both of the following.

· Genetic information

· Environmental influences

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include the explanation that the presence of Notonecta chemical cues enhanced expression of genes associated with crest development in the Daphnia.
The response includes the explanation that the presence of Notonecta chemical cues enhanced expression of genes associated with crest development in the Daphnia.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include a prediction that the relative size of the crest height and width of the offspring will resemble that of the original population.
The response includes a prediction that the relative size of the crest height and width of the offspring will resemble that of the original population.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include both of the following criteria.
The response includes both of the following criteria.
